message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $11,500.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,800 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need at least $10,500 to make this work.  Let's meet in the middle.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,500 is still a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,900?
Bob, I'm really trying to work with you here, but I can't go any lower than $10,200. This is a fair price for both of us.  Let's make this deal happen.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. How about we meet at $9,500?
